import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Form, Button, Col, Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; class Addbook extends Component { state={ bookName:'', authorName:'' } handleFormData= (e)=> { this.setState({ bookName:e.target.value }) } handleFormAuthor= (e)=> { this.setState({ authorName:e.target.value }) } addData = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("Adding Data..."); console.log(this.state.bookName); console.log(this.state.authorName); } render() { return (

ADD NEW BOOK

BOOK NAME AUTHOR PRICE ISBN USERNAME PASSWORD
) } } export default Addbook;
